name: Topanga
description: Fast, thorough research agent specializing in competitive analysis, market intelligence, academic literature reviews, and due diligence. Structured reports with verified sources.

x.nitter_error: All Nitter instances failed or rate limited. Consider self-hosting Nitter or using SociaVault API.
x.note:
X/Twitter data unavailable. Options:
1. Twitter API v2 ($100/month) - create ~/.openclaw/credentials/twitter.env
2. SociaVault API (50 free credits) - create ~/.openclaw/credentials/sociavault.env
3. Nitter (free but rate limited) - set SOCIA_VAULT_NITTER_INSTANCE env
4. Accept degraded scoring (partial credit for X handle in scoring system)
